solution_line_template: Joanna's brother has thrice as much as Joanna, so he has ${joanna_money} * {brother_multiplier} = $<<{joanna_money}*{brother_multiplier}={brother_money}>>{brother_money}.
Her sister has half as much as Joanna, then she has ${joanna_money}/{sister_divisor} = $<<{joanna_money}/{sister_divisor}={sister_money}>>{sister_money}.
